sentences.en: A woman's body wad found to have been bathed in blood.
sentences.cn: 发现一具女尸满身是血.

sentences.en: After balling each sheet of paper into a wad, she threw it away.
sentences.cn: 她把每张纸搓成团后就扔掉了.

sentences.en: For this follow - up study, 133 WAD patients and 223 control subjects were recruited again.
sentences.cn: 为了此次随访研究, 再次纳入了133名WAD患者和223名对照者.

sentences.en: He's got a healthy wad salted away.
sentences.cn: 他已经有为数可观的积蓄.

sentences.en: Open the door wide and wedge it with a wad of newspaper.
sentences.cn: 把门开大,再用一卷报纸把它楔牢.

sentences.en: Philpott tamped a wad of tobacco into his pipe.
sentences.cn: 菲尔波特往烟斗里塞了一卷碎烟叶。

sentences.en: Put a wad of paper under the leg of the table to make it level.
sentences.cn: 桌子腿底下垫点纸就平了.

sentences.en: She balled the letter into a wad.
She handed over a wad of forms.
The endocardsitis wad confirmed by blood culture, surgical findings and tissue pathology.
sentences.cn: 心内膜炎的诊断,经由血液培养, 手术时所见及组织病理的检查得到证实.

sentences.en: There are a wad of bank notes in the bag.
They shot their wad in less than two months.
sentences.cn: 例:他们不到两个月就把钱花光了.

sentences.en: Use this wad of cloth to plug the barrel.
Wad the space with paper, please.
Watching Tom, I saw the wad of muscle back of his shoulder tighten under his coat.
sentences.cn: 我注视着汤姆, 看见他肩膀后面那团肌肉在上衣下面紧张起来.

trans.tran_cn: 填充物，炮塞（弹塞），小块软物，可观的一卷纸币，大量的钱
使成一团（或一卷，一叠等），（用填料）填塞，将炮弹放入（炮筒），把弹塞填入
